lead_paragraph: Years before he was accused of insider trading, former SAC Capital Advisors portfolio manager Mathew Martoma forged a Harvard transcript, falsified an email, and created a dummy forensic computing company to try to cover his tracks, according to a court document unsealed on Thursday.

headline.main: SAC's Martoma Tried to Cover Up Fraud at Harvard, Documents Show
headline.print_headline: SAC's Martoma Tried to Cover Up Fraud at Harvard, Documents Show
